amendment.description: Amendment zeroes out $5.7 million in funding for the Open World Leadership Center and applies the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 114-120 to zero out $5,700,000 in funding for the Open World Leadership Center and applies the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ratcliffe amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 224 - 199 (Roll no. 245).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ratcliffe amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 224 - 199 (Roll no. 245).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Ratcliffe.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
